description: Interact with Google Calendar. Requests Google API authorization upon first launch. More information: https://github.com/insanum/gcalcli.

useCases.description: List your events for all your calendars over the next 7 days:

Display an ASCII calendar of events by week:
Display an ASCII calendar of events for a month:
Quick-add an event to your calendar:
